d:
Hey guys, welcome to my newest comic, Tales From Belmona! This is yet another long, slow burning series with a prostitution/freeuse and in future chapters, corruption focus and involves a lot of worldbuilding. Hopefully you guys enjoy it and I'd love to hear your feedback!

Here is the Album for this comic: https://lensdump.com/a/PQaGT/sub Once you click into a chapter, you can use the "oldest" or the "A-Z" buttons to sort the pages properly.

Please consider supporting me on Patreon if you enjoy my work!

All patrons have access to 1440p versions of the new chapters, and silver + gold tier patrons have access to the 4k versions.

https://www.patreon.com/Antalore42

If you have any questions or suggestions, consider joining my discord, where I'm most accessible. Thank you!
